name: MG ZS EV
description: The price of MG ZS EV, a SUV, ranges from Rs. 18.98  - 25.20 Lakh. It is available in 7 variants. ZS EV has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. MG ZS EV is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 461 Km for ZS EV.
